name: Berry Sunhat
description: The girl quietly walked into the jungle, seeing the ripe fruits hanging on the tree. She carefully picked up some fruits and add them to the sunhat made by her grandmother. (thank you very much for your purchase. This beautiful ornament is unavailable on the exchange during the activity, the transaction will be normal after the period. By Ina, July 2017.)

name: Big Bottle of Grass Juice
description: The green juice squeezed out of mottlegrass by Geffen Mages, Packed in large bottles. Drinking it increases M.Atk by 15%. The effect lasts 15 minutes, Cannot stack up with other sake, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Big Cat Appreciation
description: For all the believer and fans, Big Cat team give this appreciation gift to you. Open up will receive a full set of Fantasy Generator Ⅰ headwears! (Available after February 2019)

name: Big Cat Celebration Giftbox
description: To celebrate this special day, open up will receive one of the following: 2 Lightning Chain, 500 Eden Coin, 2 Mora, 100 Adventure Meatabll, 1 Valkyrie's Gift, 1 Gold Medal

name: Big Cat Celebration Voucher
description: Thank you for supporting the game~ Use it to open up the [Big Cat Celebration Store], you can exchange all the presents you wanted.

name: Big Cat Royal Coke
description: A special beverage that’s been all the rage in Big Cat Planet recently!  It is said to be the favorite of warriors who stay up all night fighting [Prince Devil]  (Restores 400 HP and 40 SP every 6s. STR ＋10, VIT ＋10, Max HP ＋1000, Melee Damage ＋20%. Effect lasts 30m.)

name: Big Cat Royal Fried Chicken
description: A special snack that’s been all the rage in Big Cat Planet recently! It is said to be the favorite of warriors who stay up all night fighting [Prince Devil] (Restores 600 HP and 40 SP every 6s. DEX ＋10, INT ＋10, M.Dmg ＋20%, Ranged Damage ＋20%. Effect lasts 30m.)

name: Big Cat Royal Pack
description: A new-year pack issued by the royal [Big Cat] Court. It's time to see if you're blessed with the royal spirit! (You may receive a large deal of Zeny after use!) (This effect is only applicable to European royalty)

name: Big Cat Royal Pack 1.0
description: Happy New Year, This is a red pack from Big Cat company, You can open it to receive a certain number of Zeny.
